profile.name: Amazing Emily
profile.description: Welcome to a healthy & happy life!

bio.name: Emily Clarke
bio.description: I’m all about living a healthy life – a healthy & happy life! Because you can be both. Being healthy doesn’t mean you have to torture yourself with crazy exercise or diets. Trust me, I’m doing it every day. :)

donations.title: Donate to Amazing Emily
donations.description: I would love your financial support, so I can spend more and more time creating content for you guys!
